LanguageData.MakeRiceStoneSlurryRice10.label: Momi⇒Brown rice(10)

LanguageData.MakeRiceStoneSlurryGRice10.label: 籾米(もち米)をもち米にする(10)
LanguageData.MakeRiceStoneSlurryGRice10.description: 臼で籾を外してもち米と籾殻にわける。
LanguageData.MakeRiceStoneSlurryGRice50.label: 籾米(もち米)をもち米にする(50)
LanguageData.MakeRiceStoneSlurryGRice50.description: 臼で籾を外してもち米と籾殻にわける。
LanguageData.MakeRiceStoneSlurryRice10_1.label: Polite Momi⇒Brown rice(10)
LanguageData.MakeRiceStoneSlurryRice10_1.description: Momi is divided into Brown rice and Outher hull.\nBy doing it politely you can earn a small amount of white rice.
LanguageData.MakeRiceStoneSlurryRice50_2.label: Polite Momi⇒Brown rice(50)
LanguageData.MakeRiceStoneSlurryRice50_2.description: Momi is divided into Brown rice and Outher hull.\nBy doing it politely you can earn a small amount of white rice.

LanguageData.ZP_MakeKonnyaku10.description: 蒸した里芋をを磨ってから石灰水と混ぜ型にいれて固める。
